#summary Release Notes for official builds.
#labels Featured

= Version 3 (`MarkdownDoclet-3.0.jar`)

* Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/markdown-doclet/issues/detail?id=5 issue 5] - unable to use custom taglets with Markdown Doclet.

= Version 2 (`MarkdownDoclet-v2.jar`) =

  * Made changes such that <A></A> tags are correctly parsed by Markdown. This fixes the {@link} issues
  * Made changes such that `code` tags are replaced with the markdown "`" character. This fixes some instances of badly nested HTML in legacy Javadocs.
